name: bombermanos
description: Game utilizando react, tailwind, typescript, redis e postgres

scripts.install: npm run install:client && npm run install:login && npm run install:game
scripts.dev: start "Client" npm run dev:client && start "LoginServer" npm run dev:login && start "GameServer" npm run dev:game
scripts.start:game: cd gameserver && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.start:login: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build && npm run start

author: Luis Gustavo CZP
